[#climatic-condition_feature-type]
====== Feature type

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]
|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:plot-description:climatic-condition:feature-type`
|Label | Feature type
|Definition | Instances of `tern:Observation` with `sosa:observedProperty` value `TBA` _MUST_ have a `tern:featureType` with the value link:http://linked.data.gov.au/def/tern-cv/6d40d71e-58cd-4f75-8304-40c01fe5f74c[`climate`].
|Comment | TERN's ecologists have determined the feature type is _climate_, defined by the link:https://www.publish.csiro.au/book/5230/[Australian Soil and Land Survey Field Handbook].
include::../../../statuses/submitted.adoc[]
|Conformance Classes | `TBA`

|Source | TERN Ecosystem Surveillance Ecological Monitoring Protocols
|Validators | link:https://github.com/ternaustralia/dawe-rlp-spec/blob/main/shapes/plot-description/climatic-condition/shapes.ttl[`/shapes/plot-description/climatic-condition/shapes.ttl`]
|Examples | Valid: link:https://github.com/ternaustralia/dawe-rlp-spec/blob/main/shapes/plot-description/climatic-condition/valid.ttl[`/shapes/plot-description/climatic-condition/valid.ttl`]

Invalid: link:https://github.com/ternaustralia/dawe-rlp-spec/blob/main/shapes/plot-description/climatic-condition/invalid.ttl[`/shapes/plot-description/climatic-condition/invalid.ttl`]
